description: Delicious Turkish single layer (i.e. not a pocket) flat bread, made with Woolworths yogurt. No oven needed.
name: Bazlama - Turkish Yogurt Flat Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drop them into the pan, and cook (covered) for 4 minutes each side. You will have to cook them in batches of 2 or 3 because they are quite large. They should be like the photo; i.e. brown patches, not scorched. All done.
